description:
### General
This app brings Deezer direct to your desktop, where you can enjoy all of your music and usual features, plus HotKeys, Offline Mode and an improved look and feel.

### Supported Systems
*	Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10

### Features
*	Flow
*	Channels & Mixes
*	Playlists
*	Offline Mode
*	Hotkey control with your keyboard
*	Exclusive video Content from live Sessions to interviews
*	FLAC audio quality support (HiFi subscribers only)

### Miscellaneous
*	The Deezer desktop app is available to all users. You'll need Windows 7 or later or macOS 10.13 or later.
*	Offline Mode only available to Deezer Family, Deezer Student, Deezer Premium or Deezer HiFi users
summary: Deezer desktop app for streaming music on Windows
author: Deezer
